snippet.title: Crystal Raiders VR | Steam Full Release Trailer
snippet.description:
🔮Get the game now on Steam 👉🏻 https://bit.ly/3DKUkRy
🏹 Join our Discord to meet other raiders!  👉  https://discord.gg/2DY2s6T

🏹 About Crystal Raiders
Enter the castles full of treasures and dangers. Choose your weapon to fight, avoid traps and solve puzzles to survive all the way through and to find the lost dwarven artefacts. Play alone or in co-op up to four players!
